item.title: Government spending to combat 'misinformation' jumped massively under Biden

item.title: Trump says Bondi, his new pick for attorney general, will refocus DOJ and make America safe again
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced Thursday evening that former Florida Attorney General Pam Bondi is his pick for U.S. attorney general, hours af...

item.title: Senators tee up post-Thanksgiving votes on more of Biden's judicial nominees
item.description: The Senate departed for its Thanksgiving break Thursday with a deal in place to vote on six of President Biden's judicial nominees when they return.

item.title: Bob Casey concedes to David McCormick in Pennsylvania Senate race
item.description: Sen. Bob Casey, Pennsylvania Democrat, officially conceded defeat in his reelection bid.
